original: Nakilesañceva naasaṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakileso ceva naasaṅkilesiko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na kilesam ca iva na asaṅkilesikam ca dhammam paṭicca na kilesaḥ ca iva na asaṅkilesikaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naasaṅkilesikañceva nano ca kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkilesiko ceva nano ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na asaṅkilesikam ca iva na no ca kilesam dhammam paṭicca na asaṅkilesikaḥ ca iva na no ca kilesaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nakilesañceva naasaṅkilesikañca naasaṅkilesikañceva nano ca kilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakileso ceva naasaṅkilesiko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kilesam ca iva na asaṅkilesikam ca na asaṅkilesikam ca iva na no ca kilesam ca dhammam paṭicca na kilesaḥ ca iva na asaṅkilesikaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
